title: 廉政教育基地一层平面图

design_explanation: 1. Concrete road design: 4 meters wide, about 12.8 meters long (new), 2 meters wide, 70 meters long (repair)
2. Greening area: Planting about 50 to 80 square meters high, canopy about 50 to 60 centimeters, 12 benches can be placed.
3. Corridor 1, Corridor 2 and the reconstruction of the platform: Concrete (Scheme 1), Brick (Scheme 2)

intention_and_overview: The drawing shows the layout of the first floor of the廉政教育基地, including the design of new roads, staircases, corridors, and greening areas, along with specific dimensions and quantities.
